rows.label: qev025903_MSG0001
rows.name:
You! You dare interfere with the glorious works of the
Bringer of Miracles again?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025903_MSG0002
rows.name:
Speak, avatar of god! Grant me your words!
Grant me another of your miracles![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025903_MSG0003
rows.name: ...So be it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025903_MSG0004
rows.name:
I understand... You are a demon come to blaspheme
against the one true god.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025903_JNK0010
rows.name: Stammer

rows.label: qev025903_SEL0011
rows.name: Blurt out a question about who this new Fraisie is.

rows.label: qev025903_JNK0020
rows.name: Focus

rows.label: qev025903_SEL0021
rows.name: Demand that this so-called "avatar" identify itself.

rows.label: qev025903_MSG0005
rows.name:
MIND YOUR TONGUE! This is a miracle incarnate!
It merely borrows my form on this corporeal plane.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025903_MSG0006
rows.name:
This is an avatar of my god, the Bringer of Miracles!
This is the holy made flesh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025903_MSG0007
rows.name: Fraisie and I are one, and yet we are distinct.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025903_MSG0008
rows.name:
I am unworthy of such an honor. For the being that
stands before you is an avatar of my god, the Bringer
of Miracles![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025903_MSG0009
rows.name:
Loyal Fraisie... I shall use the Ma-non blood you
offered up as a conduit to summon forth messengers
from the heavens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025903_MSG0010
rows.name: R-really? I don't have the words... Oh, joy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025903_MSG0011
rows.name:
Ha ha ha! This is but a taste of what shall come.
In time, you and I will bring about a far grimmer
miracle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025903_MSG0012
rows.name: Now... Come forth, harbingers of miracles![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025903_MSG0013
rows.name:
Aaaaah! Such glorious forms!
Truly, these are the children of god![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025903_JNK0030
rows.name: Correct

rows.label: qev025903_SEL0031
rows.name: Point out that they're clearly Ganglion puges.

rows.label: qev025903_JNK0040
rows.name: Prepare

rows.label: qev025903_SEL0041
rows.name: Ignore the crazed Fraisie and adopt a combat stance.

rows.label: qev025903_MSG0014
rows.name:
Even god appears as a demon in the blind eyes of
the heretic. Your inability to perceive their glory only
proves their holiness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025903_MSG0015
rows.name:
Good Fraisie...sweet and pure.
You are forever mine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025903_MSG0016
rows.name:
You would strike the divine? Aaaaah!
How can such willful foolishness exist?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025903_MSG0017
rows.name:
Spare it no concern, Fraisie. So long as you remain
pure and true, it is no matter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025903_MSG0018
rows.name:
In time, the world will come to embrace the Bringer of
Miracles just as you have.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025903_MSG0019
rows.name:
Now go, my harbingers! Cleanse this place of these
impure ones![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025903_MSG0020
rows.name:
Bringer of Miracles... Burn these blasphemous fools to
ash with your holy light...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025903_MSG0021
rows.name:
The avatar is...dead? No. No, that isn't...
That's not possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025903_MSG0022
rows.name:
I won't believe a single word from your lying lips!
Heathens! Demons! Deceivers![ST:wait ]
